description: det(M) where M is an n X n matrix with M[i,j]=lcm(i,j).
links: Enrique Pérez Herrero, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..200
formula: For n >= 2 a(n) = n! * product(j=2, ..., n)(product(p|j)(1-p)) (where the second product is over all primes p that divide j) [Cf. A023900] - Avi Peretz (njk(AT)netvision.net.il), Mar 22 2001a(n)=n!*prod(p<n,(1-p)^floor(n/p)) where the product runs through the primes. - _Benoit Cloitre_, Jan 31 2008a(n)=A000142(n)*A085542(n) [From _Enrique Pérez Herrero_, Jun 08 2010]
mathematica: A060238 [n_]:=n!*Product[(1 - Prime[i])^Floor[n/Prime[i]], {i, 1, PrimePi[n]}]; [From _Enrique Pérez Herrero_, Jun 08 2010]
author: MCKAY john (mckay(AT)cs.concordia.ca), Mar 21 2001
